page.title: 13SHARESHILL CHURCH IN l985
page.content: The church of St.Mary and St.Luke in the diocese of Lichfield serves the parishes of Featherstone,Shareshill, Hilton and Saredon.The present vicar was inducted on 4th March l985 and lives in a modern vicarage at Feather- stone.The original Tudor vicarage next door to the church was sold in July l984.The congregation has declined over the years and now consists of 75 people on the electoral roll,however in November l985 2O parishioners will be confirmed at St.Michaels Church, Penkridge,by a Bishop of the diocese. The Sunday School is being reintroduced and hopefully this upward trend will continue.Services are held at lO a.m. on Sunday,when an average of 4O men, women and children attend worship.Fund- raising to repair the roof has been going on for a number of years.
